ValidationRule.description: If the Lead Status is Converted or Open - Awaiting App (App Sent) then there should be value in Rating Picklist.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(Status),'App Sent'), CONTAINS(TEXT(Status), 'Converted')) , ISBLANK(TEXT(Rating)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Provide Rating of Lead if the Lead Status is 'Open - Awaiting App (App Sent)' or 'Converted'.
